code: import{Language}from'../../../../utils/constants';import CN from'./zh-CN';import US from'./en-US';import JP from'./ja-JP';import KR from'./ko-KR';export default function translate(locale,key,options){let message;switch(locale){case Language.ZH_CN:message=CN[key];break;case Language.JA_JP:message=JP[key];break;case Language.KO_KR:message=KR[key];break;default:message=US[key];break;}if(message){let msg=message;if(options&&options.values){Object.keys(options.values).forEach(k=>{msg=msg.replace(new RegExp("{".concat(k,"}"),'g'),options.values[k]);});}return msg;}return key;}
